content.question: In your response, be sure to address all parts of the question. Use complete sentences; an outline or bulleted list alone is not acceptable Using the excerpt, answer (a), (b), and (c). Briefly describe ONE historical development depicted in the letter. Briefly describe ONE way in which a historical development represented in the letter reflected a change or a continuity from earlier colonial British North American history. Briefly explain ONE purpose of the letter.

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Identify a historical concept, development, or process.
